title: A Poem for Lee
author: Tales From the Playa
content:
Morning.
A blood-red ball
on the chill, jagged edge of the earth.
I squeeze my bladder
like an orange
into the playa dust
and recall a dream
of beauty and grace
in a neon-lit, throbbing
desert evening
that turned into night
but never turned intoâ€¦
Morning.

by Denise-Christine
